data.title: Version Details
data.meta_description: EVS is globally recognized as the leader in live video technology for broadcast and new media productions. Our passion and purpose are to help our clients craft immersive stories that trigger the best return on emotion. Through a wide range of products and solutions, we deliver the most gripping live sports images, buzzing entertainment shows and breaking news content to
data.text:
LiveCeption

Live production, replay and highlights solutions. Our LiveCeption solutions, which combine our state-of-the-art production tools with the latest technology advancements, are designed to enhance the visual narrative of all your productions, whatever the requirement, whatever the budget.

Newsroom Production

From multi-source ingest, fast playback operations and turnaround editing through to delivery for multiple platforms, EVS' solution allows you to produce real-time coverage of stories as they unfold, with complete peace of mind.

Outside Broadcast Production Trucks

EVS is the trusted leader within OB facilities for the production of live slow, super slow and ultra-motion replays as well as instant graphics applications and on-the-fly highlights creation.

Archive & Delivery

Content is your prime business and EVS archive and delivery tools enable new revenue streams from your rich archives.

Officiating

EVS officiating lets your decision makers look, react, and respond to actions faster than any other replay solution.

Digital Content Distribution

Linking coverage to social networks and allowing viewers to watch from any location or device is now the norm. The EVS distribution platform empowers all content from EVS live production servers and helps you leverage it to your connected fans.
